reporter-output.line: Open url 'http://qa5.qa.nbcupublisher7.publisher7.com'.
Enter the user's email address in the 'Email Address' text box.
Enter the user's password in the 'Password' text box.
Click the 'Login' button.
Click the 'Modules' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Modules dialog'.
Enter 'Pub Movie Relationships' in the 'Filter Name' text box.
Wait for the module titled 'Pub Movie Relationships' to appear in the list.
Verify the 'Pub Movie Relationships' check box is checked.
Enter 'Pub Relationships' in the 'Filter Name' text box.
Wait for the module titled 'Pub Relationships' to appear in the list.
Verify the 'Pub Relationships' check box is checked.
Enter 'Pub TV Relationships' in the 'Filter Name' text box.
Wait for the module titled 'Pub TV Relationships' to appear in the list.
Verify the 'Pub TV Relationships' check box is checked.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Mouse over the 'Configuration' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Content authoring' menu link.
Click the 'Relationships Settings' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Relationships Settings dialog'.
Click the 'TV' tab.
Uncheck all checked check boxes.
Check the 'Character Profile' checkbox.
Select 'Show' from the 'Character Profile TV Relationship Depth' drop down list.
Check the 'TV Episode' checkbox.
Select 'Season' from the 'TV Episode TV Relationship Depth' drop down list.
Check the 'TV Season' checkbox.
Select 'Show' from the 'TV Season TV Relationship Depth' drop down list.
Click the 'Movies' tab.
Uncheck all checked check boxes.
Check the 'Character Profile' checkbox.
Click the 'Save configuration' button.
Verify success message of 'The configuration options have been saved.' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Mouse over the 'Content' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Add content' menu link.
Click the 'TV Show' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create TV Show dialog'.
Scroll to and click the 'Basic Information' tab.
Enter 'a9a9fbcdf71b4e7' in the 'Title' text box.
Switch to the Synopsis frame.
Enter a randomized text string into the 'Body' text area.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create TV Show dialog'.
Click the Logo 'Select' button.
Switch to the select file frame.
Enter the file path for file upload.
Click the 'Upload' button.
Wait for the file link to be visible after upload.
Click the 'Next' button.
Click the 'Public Local Files' radio button.
Click the 'Next' button.
Verify the file image 'HanSolo' is present.
Verify the img is loaded and visible.
Click the 'Save' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create TV Show dialog'.
Click the Cover Media 'Select' button.
Switch to the select file frame.
